title: Breaker Blade
summaries: The Breaker Blade is a Hardmode broadsword. It is currently the third largest sword in the game, giving it a great melee reach It has a 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) / 25*1/4 (25%) chance to be dropped by the Wall of Flesh. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile versions, it will also deal 250% damage to enemies with over 90% health.
